trans-unit.source: Component Singularity. Singularity is the degree to which components have a narrowly focused purpose. In CodeIgniter, each class and its functions are highly autonomous in order to allow maximum usefulness.
trans-unit.target: 组件奇点。奇异性是组件具有狭窄目标的程度。在CodeIgniter中，每个类及其功能都是高度自治的，以便最大程度地发挥作用。

trans-unit.source: Controllers act as glue code, marshaling data back and forth between the view (or the user that’s seeing it) and the data storage.
trans-unit.target: 控制器充当粘合代码，在视图（或看到它的用户）与数据存储之间来回处理数据。

trans-unit.source: Database Displays a list of queries that all database connections have performed, and their execution time.

trans-unit.source: Document Encoding - Typically the type of compression used on the results.

trans-unit.source: Document Language - For sites that support multiple languages, this helps determine which to return.

trans-unit.source: Don’t forget to include each field name in the :php:func:`set_value()` function calls!

trans-unit.source: Dynamic Instantiation. In CodeIgniter, components are loaded and routines executed only when requested, rather than globally. No assumptions are made by the system regarding what may be needed beyond the minimal core resources, so the system is very light-weight by default. The events, as triggered by the HTTP request, and the controllers and views you design will determine what is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 动态实例化。在CodeIgniter中，仅在请求时才加载组件，并且例程仅在全局而不是例程中执行。对于最小核心资源以外可能需要的系统，系统未作任何假设，因此默认情况下，系统的重量很轻。HTTP请求触发的事件以及您设计的控制器和视图将确定调用的内容。

trans-unit.source: Events displays a list of all events that have been loaded during this request.
trans-unit.target: 事件显示在此请求期间已加载的所有事件的列表。

trans-unit.source: File Handler is the default handler and will create a single file for every day locally. This is the recommended method of logging.
trans-unit.target: 文件处理程序是默认处理程序，它将每天在本地创建一个文件。这是推荐的日志记录方法。

trans-unit.source: Files displays a list of all files that have been loaded during this request.
trans-unit.target: 文件显示此请求期间已加载的所有文件的列表。

trans-unit.source: Help description will be automatically generated according to the above parameters.

trans-unit.source: Logs Any information that was logged will be displayed here. In long-running systems, or systems with many items being logged, this can cause memory issues and should be disabled.
trans-unit.target: 日志任何已记录的信息将在此处显示。在长时间运行的系统或记录了许多项目的系统中，这可能会导致内存问题，应将其禁用。

trans-unit.source: Loose Coupling. Coupling is the degree to which components of a system rely on each other. The less components depend on each other the more reusable and flexible the system becomes. Our goal was a very loosely coupled system.
trans-unit.target: 松耦合。耦合是系统组件相互依赖的程度。组件之间相互依赖的次数越少，系统变得越可重用且更具灵活性。我们的目标是建立一个松散耦合的系统。

trans-unit.source: Media/Document Type - this could be image format, or HTML vs. XML or JSON.
trans-unit.target: 媒体/文档类型-可以是图像格式，也可以是HTML与XML或JSON。

trans-unit.source: Models manage the data of the application and help to enforce any special business rules the application might need.
trans-unit.target: 模型管理应用程序的数据，并帮助实施应用程序可能需要的任何特殊业务规则。

trans-unit.source: Most users will never have any need to do this, but the option to replace or extend them does exist for those who would like to significantly alter the CodeIgniter core.
trans-unit.target: 大多数用户永远都不需要这样做，但是对于那些想大大改变CodeIgniter核心的人来说，确实存在替换或扩展它们的选项。

trans-unit.source: Sequential: each migration is numbered in sequence, starting with 001. Each number must be three digits, and there must not be any gaps in the sequence. (This was the numbering scheme prior to CodeIgniter 3.0.)
trans-unit.target: 顺序的：每个迁移都从001开始按顺序编号。每个数字必须为三位数，并且序列中不得有任何空格。（这是CodeIgniter 3.0之前的编号方案。）

Since you haven’t told the Form Validation class to validate anything yet, it returns FALSE (boolean false) by default. ``The run()`` method only returns TRUE if it has successfully applied your rules without any of them failing.

Text: The watermark message will be generated using text, either with a True Type font that you specify, or using the native text output that the GD library supports. If you use the True Type version your GD installation must be compiled with True Type support (most are, but not all).
trans-unit.target: 文本：水印消息将使用文本（您指定的True Type字体）或GD库支持的本机文本输出生成。如果使用True Type版本，则GD安装必须在True Type支持下进行编译（大多数是，但不是全部）。

trans-unit.source: Timers collects all of the benchmark data, both by the system and by your application.
trans-unit.target: 计时器通过系统和应用程序收集所有基准数据。

trans-unit.source: Timestamp: each migration is numbered using the timestamp when the migration was created, in YYYYMMDDHHIISS format (e.g. 20121031100537). This helps prevent numbering conflicts when working in a team environment, and is the preferred scheme in CodeIgniter 3.0 and later.
trans-unit.target: 时间戳：每个迁移都使用创建迁移时的时间戳进行编号，格式为YYYYMMDDHHIISS（例如20121031100537）。这有助于防止在团队环境中工作时发生编号冲突，这是CodeIgniter 3.0及更高版本中的首选方案。

trans-unit.source: Tip: Any functions in your class that are named identically to the methods in the parent class will be used instead of the native ones (this is known as “method overriding”). This allows you to substantially alter the CodeIgniter core.
trans-unit.target: 提示：将使用类中与父类中的方法命名相同的任何函数，而不是本机函数（这称为“方法重写”）。这使您可以实质性地更改CodeIgniter核心。

trans-unit.source: Views Displays render time for views on the timeline, and shows any data passed to the views on a separate tab.
trans-unit.target: 视图在时间轴上显示视图的渲染时间，并在单独的选项卡上显示传递给视图的所有数据。

trans-unit.source: Views are simple files, with little to no logic, that display the information to the user.
trans-unit.target: 视图是简单的文件，几乎没有逻辑，向用户显示信息。

trans-unit.source: When a controller’s name matches the first segment of a URI, it will be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 当控制器名称与URI的第一段匹配时，它将被加载。

trans-unit.source: Why only a method to re-encode the data instead of maintaining legacy methods for both encoding and decoding? The algorithms in the Encrypt library have improved in CodeIgniter 2.x both for performance and security, and we do not wish to encourage continued use of the older methods. You can of course extend the Encryption library if you wish and replace the new methods with the old and retain seamless compatibility with CodeIgniter 1.x encrypted data, but this a decision that a developer should make cautiously and deliberately, if at all.
trans-unit.target: 为什么只使用一种方法对数据进行重新编码，而不是同时保留用于编码和解码的旧方法？Encrypt库中的算法在CodeIgniter 2.x中进行了性能和安全性方面的改进，我们不希望鼓励继续使用旧方法。当然，如果愿意，您可以扩展Encryption库，并用旧的方法替换新的方法，并保持与CodeIgniter 1.x加密数据的无缝兼容性，但这是开发人员应谨慎做出的决定（如果有的话）。

trans-unit.source: display_override Overrides the _display() method, used to send the finalized page to the web browser at the end of system execution. This permits you to use your own display methodology. Note that you will need to reference the CI superobject with $this->CI =& get_instance() and then the finalized data will be available by calling $this->CI->output->get_output().
trans-unit.target: display_override覆盖 _display() 方法，该方法用于在系统执行结束时将最终页面发送到Web浏览器。这使您可以使用自己的显示方法。请注意，您将需要使用 $this->CI =& get_instance() 引用CI超级对象，然后可以通过调用 $this->CI->output->get_output() 获得最终数据。

trans-unit.source: filepath The name of the directory containing your script. Note: Your script must be located in a directory INSIDE your application/ directory, so the file path is relative to that directory. For example, if your script is located in application/hooks/, you will simply use ‘hooks’ as your filepath. If your script is located in application/hooks/utilities/ you will use ‘hooks/utilities’ as your filepath. No trailing slash.

trans-unit.source: A key is a piece of information that controls the cryptographic process and permits an encrypted string to be decoded. In fact, the key you chose will provide the only means to decode data that was encrypted with that key, so not only must you choose the key carefully, you must never change it if you intend use it for persistent data.
trans-unit.target: 甲密钥是一条信息，其控制的密码处理，并允许要被解码的加密的字符串。实际上，您选择的密钥将提供解码使用该密钥加密的数据的唯一方法，因此，不仅您必须仔细选择密钥，而且如果打算将其用于持久性数据，也绝不能对其进行更改。

trans-unit.source: A CodeIgniter 4 app can be run in a number of different ways: hosted on a web server, using virtualization, or using CodeIgniter’s command line tool for testing. This section addresses how to use each technique, and explains some of the pros and cons of them.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter 4应用程序可以通过多种不同方式运行：托管在Web服务器上，使用虚拟化或使用CodeIgniter的命令行工具进行测试。本节介绍如何使用每种技术，并说明其中的一些利弊。

trans-unit.source: A CodeIgniter4 webapp is normally hosted on a web server. Apache’s httpd is the “standard” platform, and assumed in much of our documentation.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter4 Web应用程序通常托管在Web服务器上。Apache的 httpd 是“标准”平台，在我们的许多文档中都假定使用。

trans-unit.source: A Controller is simply a class file that is named in a way that it can be associated with a URI.
trans-unit.target: Controller是一个简单的类文件,它的命名方式可以与URI相关联。

trans-unit.source: A DELETE request to URL with “products” as first the segment and a number in the second will be mapped to the Product::delete() method, passing the numeric value as the first parameter.
trans-unit.target: 对URL的DELETE请求以“ products”作为第一个段，第二个为数字，将被映射到 Product::delete() 方法，并将数字值作为第一个参数。
PHP日期兼容的格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: A Response class is instantiated for you and passed into your controllers. It can be accessed through $this->response. Many times you will not need to touch the class directly, since CodeIgniter takes care of sending the headers and the body for you. This is great if the page successfully created the content it was asked to. When things go wrong, or you need to send very specific status codes back, or even take advantage of the powerful HTTP caching, it’s there for you.
trans-unit.target: 为您实例化了一个Response类，并将其传递给您的控制器。可以通过 $this->response 访问。很多时候，您不需要直接接触类，因为CodeIgniter会为您发送标题和正文。如果页面成功创建了要求的内容，那就太好了。当出现问题时，或者您需要发回非常具体的状态代码，或者甚至利用强大的HTTP缓存时，它就在那里。

trans-unit.source: A classic example of this is a browser that cannot display PNG files can request only GIF or JPEG images. When the getServer receives the request, it looks at the available file types the client is requesting and selects the best match from the image formats that it supports, in this case likely choosing a JPEG image to return.
trans-unit.target: 一个典型的例子是,一个不能显示PNG文件的浏览器只能请求GIF或JPEG图片。当getServer接收到请求时,它会查看客户端请求的可用文件类型,并从它支持的图片格式中选择最佳匹配的图片,在这种情况下很可能选择JPEG图片来返回。

trans-unit.source: A migration will only be run against a single database group. If you have multiple groups defined in app/Config/Database.php, then it will run against the $defaultGroup as specified in that same configuration file. There may be times when you need different schemas for different database groups. Perhaps you have one database that is used for all general site information, while another database is used for mission critical data. You can ensure that migrations are run only against the proper group by setting the $DBGroup property on your migration. This name must match the name of the database group exactly:
trans-unit.target: 迁移将仅针对单个数据库组运行。如果您在app / Config / Database.php中定义了多个组，则它将针对同一配置文件中指定的 $defaultGroup 运行。有时，对于不同的数据库组，您需要不同的架构。也许您有一个数据库可用于所有常规站点信息，而另一个数据库可用于关键任务数据。通过在迁移上设置 $DBGroup 属性，可以确保仅针对正确的组运行迁移。此名称必须与数据库组的名称完全匹配：

trans-unit.source: A model’s job is to maintain a single type of data for the application. This might be users, blog posts, transactions, etc. In this case, the model’s job has two parts: enforce business rules on the data as it is pulled from, or put into, the database; and handle the actual saving and retrieval of the data from the database.
trans-unit.target: 模型的工作是为应用程序维护单一类型的数据。这可能是用户，博客文章，交易等。在这种情况下，模型的工作包括两个部分：在从数据库中提取或放入数据库时​​，对数据实施业务规则；并处理数据库中数据的实际保存和检索。

trans-unit.source: A nice feature of the Form Validation class is that it permits you to store all your validation rules for your entire application in a config file. You can organize these rules into “groups”. These groups can either be loaded automatically when a matching controller/method is called, or you can manually call each set as needed.

trans-unit.source: A route simply takes the URI on the left, and maps it to the controller and method on the right, along with any parameters that should be passed to the controller. The controller and method should be listed in the same way that you would use a static method, by separating the fully-namespaced class and its method with a double-colon, like Users::list. If that method requires parameters to be passed to it, then they would be listed after the method name, separated by forward-slashes:

trans-unit.source: A very basic test will probably trick you into believing that an SQL database is faster, but in 99% of the cases, this is only true while you only have a few current sessions. As the sessions count and server loads increase - which is the time when it matters - the file system will consistently outperform almost all relational database setups.
trans-unit.target: 一个非常基本的测试可能会欺骗你,让你相信SQL数据库更快,但在99%的情况下,这只是在你只有几个当前会话的时候才是真的。随着会话数和服务器负载的增加--这时才是最重要的时候--文件系统的性能将持续优于几乎所有关系型数据库的设置。

trans-unit.source: After filters are nearly identical to before filters, except that you can only return the $response object, and you cannot stop script execution. This does allow you to modify the final output, or simply do something with the final output. This could be used to ensure certain security headers were set the correct way, or to cache the final output, or even to filter the final output with a bad words filter.
trans-unit.target: 之后的过滤器与之前的过滤器几乎相同，除了只能返回 $response 对象，并且不能停止脚本执行。这确实允许您修改最终输出，或仅对最终输出执行某些操作。这可以用于确保以正确的方式设置了某些安全头，或者用于缓存最终输出，甚至可以使用错误单词过滤器来过滤最终输出。

Aliases are mandatory and if you try to use a full class name later, the system will throw an error. Defining them in this way makes it simple to switch out the class used. Great for when you decided you need to change to a different authentication system since you only change the filter’s class and you’re done.

trans-unit.source: All havingLike* method variations can be forced to perform case-insensitive searches by passing a fifth parameter of true to the method. This will use platform-specific features where available otherwise, will force the values to be lowercase, i.e. HAVING LOWER(column) LIKE '%search%'. This may require indexes to be made for LOWER(column) instead of column to be effective.
trans-unit.target: 通过将 true 的第五个参数传递给该方法，可以强制所有具有 havingLike* 方法的变体执行不区分大小写的搜索。这将使用特定于平台的功能（否则可用）将强制将这些值转换为小写，即 HAVING LOWER(column) LIKE '%search%' 。这可能需要对 LOWER(column) 进行索引，而不要对 column 进行索引。

trans-unit.source: All like* method variations can be forced to perform case-insensitive searches by passing a fifth parameter of true to the method. trans-unit.source: All of the configuration files that ship with CodeIgniter are namespaced with Config. Using this namespace in your application will provide the best performance since it knows exactly where to find the files.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter附带的所有配置文件都使用 Config 命名空间。在应用程序中使用此名称空间将提供最佳性能，因为它确切知道在哪里可以找到文件。

trans-unit.source: All of the core classes within CodeIgniter are provided as “services”. This simply means that, instead of hard-coding a class name to load, the classes to call are defined within a very simple configuration file. This file acts as a type of factory to create new instances of the required class.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter中的所有核心类均作为“服务”提供。这仅意味着，要对要调用的类进行硬定义，而不是对要加载的类名称进行硬编码，而是在一个非常简单的配置文件中定义它们。该文件是一种工厂类型，用于创建所需类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Although CodeIgniter is quite fast, the amount of dynamic information you display in your pages will correlate directly to the server resources, memory, and processing cycles utilized, which affect your page load speeds. By caching your pages, since they are saved in their fully rendered state, you can achieve performance much closer to that of static web pages.
trans-unit.target: 虽然CodeIgniter的速度相当快,但你在页面中显示的动态信息量将直接与服务器资源、内存和处理周期相关,这将影响你的页面加载速度。通过缓存你的网页,因为它们被保存在完全渲染的状态下,你可以获得更接近静态网页的性能。

trans-unit.source: Although CodeIgniter is quite fast, the amount of dynamic information you display in your pages will correlate directly to the server resources, memory, and processing cycles utilized, which affect your page load speeds. By caching your pages, since they are saved in their fully rendered state, you can achieve performance that nears that of static web pages.
trans-unit.target: 虽然CodeIgniter的速度相当快,但你在页面中显示的动态信息量将直接与服务器资源、内存和处理周期相关,这将影响你的页面加载速度。通过缓存你的网页,因为它们被保存在完全渲染的状态,你可以达到接近静态网页的性能。

trans-unit.source: An encryption key is a piece of information that controls the cryptographic process and permits a plain-text string to be encrypted, and afterwards - decrypted. It is the secret “ingredient” in the whole process that allows you to be the only one who is able to decrypt data that you’ve decided to hide from the eyes of the public. After one key is used to encrypt data, that same key provides the only means to decrypt it, so not only must you chose one carefully, but you must not lose it or you will also lose access to the data.
trans-unit.target: 的加密密钥是一条信息控制密码处理并且允许纯文本字符串进行加密，之后-解密。这是整个过程中的秘密“成分”，它使您成为唯一能够解密您决定隐藏在公众视野之外的数据的人。在使用一个密钥对数据进行加密之后，该密钥才是解密数据的唯一方法，因此，不仅您必须谨慎选择一个密钥，而且还不能丢失它，否则也将失去对数据的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: An XML-RPC request is simply the data you are sending to the XML-RPC server. Each piece of data in a request is referred to as a request parameter. The above example has two parameters: The URL and title of your site. When the XML-RPC server receives your request, it will look for parameters it requires.

trans-unit.source: An optional second parameter, is_image, allows this function to be used to test images for potential XSS attacks, useful for file upload security. When this second parameter is set to TRUE, instead of returning an altered string, the function returns TRUE if the image is safe, and FALSE if it contained potentially malicious information that a browser may attempt to execute.
trans-unit.target: 可选的第二个参数is_image允许使用此功能来测试图像是否存在潜在的XSS攻击，这对于文件上传安全性很有用。当第二个参数设置为TRUE时，如果图像是安全的，该函数将返回TRUE，而不是返回更改后的字符串，如果它包含浏览器可能尝试执行的潜在恶意信息，则返回FALSE。

trans-unit.source: And this works great. Until you decide that you want to use a different timer class in its place. Maybe this one has some advanced reporting the default timer does not provide. In order to do this, you now have to locate all of the locations in your application that you have used the timer class. Since you might have left them in place to keep a performance log of your application constantly running, this might be a time-consuming and error-prone way to handle this. That’s where services come in handy.
trans-unit.target: 这很棒。直到您决定要使用其他计时器类为止。也许这有一些高级的报告，默认计时器没有提供。为此，您现在必须在使用计时器类的应用程序中找到所有位置。由于您可能已经将它们留在原处以保持应用程序的性能日志持续运行，因此这可能是一种耗时且容易出错的方法。这就是服务派上用场的地方。

trans-unit.source: Another common usage is to determine the language the content should be served in. trans-unit.target: 另一个常见用法是确定内容应使用的语言。如果您仅运行一个语言站点，那么这显然不会有太大区别，但是任何可以提供多种内容翻译的站点都可以找到此语言。很有用，因为浏览器通常会在 Accept-Language 标头中发送首选语言：

trans-unit.source: Another good security practice is to only leave your index.php and “assets” (e.g. .js, css and image files) under your server’s webroot directory (most commonly named “htdocs/”). These are the only files that you would need to be accessible from the web.
trans-unit.target: 另一个好的安全实践是仅将index.php和“资产”（例如.js，css和图像文件）保留在服务器的webroot目录（最常见的名称为“ htdocs /”）下。这些是您唯一需要从网络上访问的文件。

trans-unit.source: Another important thing that you should know, is to make sure that you don’t use a publicly-readable or shared directory for storing your session files. Make sure that only you have access to see the contents of your chosen sess_save_path directory. Otherwise, anybody who can do that, can also steal any of the current sessions (also known as “session fixation” attack).
trans-unit.target: 您还应该知道的另一件事是，确保不要使用公共可读或共享目录来存储会话文件。确保只有您才能查看所选sess_save_path目录的内容。否则，任何能够做到这一点的人都可以窃取当前的任何会话（也称为“会话固定”攻击）。

trans-unit.source: Another important thing that you should know, is to make sure that you don’t use a publicly-readable or shared directory for storing your session files. Make sure that only you have access to see the contents of your chosen sessionSavePath directory. Otherwise, anybody who can do that, can also steal any of the current sessions (also known as “session fixation” attack).
trans-unit.target: 您还应该知道的另一件事是，确保您不使用公共可读或共享目录来存储会话文件。确保只有您有权查看所选sessionSavePath目录的内容。否则，任何可以做到的人都可以窃取当前的任何会话（也称为“会话固定”攻击）。

trans-unit.source: Any single variable substitution can have one or more filters applied to it to modify the way it is presented. These are not intended to drastically change the output, but provide ways to reuse the same variable data but with different presentations. The esc filter discussed above is one example. Dates are another common use case, where you might need to format the same data differently in several sections on the same page.
trans-unit.target: 任何单个变量替换都可以应用一个或多个过滤器以修改其表示方式。这些并不是要彻底改变输出，而是提供了重用相同变量数据但使用不同表示的方法。上面讨论的esc过滤器是一个示例。日期是另一个常见用例，您可能需要在同一页面上的多个部分中以不同的方式设置相同数据的格式。

trans-unit.source: Any site that lives long enough is bound to have pages that move. You can specify routes that should redirect to other routes with the addRedirect() method. The first parameter is the URI pattern for the old route. The second parameter is either the new URI to redirect to, or the name of a named route. The third parameter is the HTTP status code that should be sent along with the redirect. The default value is 302 which is a temporary redirect and is recommended in most cases:
trans-unit.target: 任何寿命足够长的网站都必然会移动页面。您可以使用 addRedirect() 方法指定应重定向到其他路由的路由。第一个参数是旧路由的URI模式。第二个参数是重定向到的新URI或命名路由的名称。第三个参数是应与重定向一起发送的HTTP状态代码。默认值为 302 ，它是一个临时重定向，在大多数情况下建议使用：
